Articles.Content:
Hi,

I can't for the life of me get the control surfaces to attach to the wings of my space plane at the fight angle. Instead of attaching horizontally along the rear of the wing, I only get the option of attaching them vertically! What am I doing wrong!?

All the best,

Charlie.
You can rotate them with the WASDQE keys (with shift for fine adjustments). Using the lock to angle toggle (c key or button next to symmetry) will also help with placement.
And know we know. And knowing is half the battle.
